title: What is the relationship between women and hermeticism in alchemy and yoga?
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author discusses the relationship between gender and alchemy. In the last 200 tokens, the author delves into the presence of women in traditionally masculine cults such as that of Apollo and the dynamics of their roles. The text also discusses the relationship between masculine energy and the solar principle, drawing from various traditions. Moreover, the text talks about the practice of sexual magic in yoga and how it gives rise to specific issues for women.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to understand the various forms and purposes of Yoga, and to note that certain practices, such as hatha-kundalini Yoga, may pose particular challenges for women. While the awakening of kundalini energy can be beneficial, the lack of a complementary masculine principle may limit the extent to which women can fully engage with this practice. As with all forms of Yoga, it is essential to approach hatha-kundalini Yoga with awareness and respect for its transformative power.
